          Encrypts byte arrays using the specified key with RSA using PKCS1 as default operation mode To encrypt the message, first a random session key is generated and used for encrypt the input message with a symmetric algorithm (AES-CBC), finally this key is encrypted with RSA so this function return two things, the encrypted input message and the encrypted session key
